messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-DataSet?
ComfyUI-DataSet provides data research, preparation, and manipulation nodes for model trainers and artists in ComfyUI.
ComfyUI-DataSet can be installed using comfy-cli, manually by cloning the GitHub repository, or automatically with the Comfy Manager extension.
What is the DataSet_Visualizer node used for?
The DataSet_Visualizer node is used to visualize dataset captions and generate graphs offering various perspectives on token analysis, such as word clouds, network graphs, and frequency graphs.
What are the two modes available in the DataSet_CopyFiles node?

The DataSet_CopyFiles node provides two modes: BlindCopy, which copies all files from the source to the destination folder, and CopyByDestinationFiles, which copies files from the source folder to the destination only if there is a matching file already present in the destination.
How does the DataSet_TriggerWords node extract triggerwords from captions?
The DataSet_TriggerWords node identifies triggerwords as tokens containing both letters and numbers and extracts them from the provided text file contents.
What is the difference between DataSet_TextFilesLoadFromList and DataSet_TextFilesLoad nodes?
The DataSet_TextFilesLoadFromList node takes a list of file paths as input, while the DataSet_TextFilesLoad node uses a directory path to load text files.
What is the purpose of the DataSet_PathSelector node?
The DataSet_PathSelector node is used to identify images in a sub-dataset that are missing caption text files from a larger parent repository of image-text pairings.
